>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/mail/settings/replaceMessageBody"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a flag that specifies whether to completely replace text of the email when inserting a template or not.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Boolean value: true - the flag is enabled, false - the flag is disabled","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"boolean"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
